acf.short_description:
Criniti’s is the best Italian restaurant in Carlton, serving authentic Italian flavours in the Western Suburbs. Conveniently located at 198-204 Faraday St, Carlton, VIC 3053, our restaurant offers an ideal venue to celebrate with family and friends. Our menu features more than 300 items, including the best-woodfired pizzas, ribs, pasta, seafood, grilled fish, bruschetta, risotto, and more, combining Southern Italian and contemporary Australian cuisine.

At Criniti’s, we take pride in serving the freshest ingredients, cooked to perfection, and served with a smile. Whether you’re in the mood for a quick bite or a leisurely meal, our menu caters to all tastes and dietary requirements. From classic pizzas to hearty pasta dishes, you’ll find something you love at Criniti’s.

Don’t miss the opportunity to experience the best Italian restaurant in Carlton. Visit us at Criniti’s Carlton and indulge in the flavours of Italy. Make a reservation now at crinitis.com.au and check out our menu to explore our delicious offerings. You can also find us on Google Maps for directions to our location.

As the best Italian restaurant in Carlton, we also offer an ideal event location for your function. Our famous 1-meter, 2 meters, and 3 meters woodfired pizzas are prepared using our secret recipe dough and only the freshest ingredients. Our menu also features authentic Italian antipasti, ribs, steaks, burgers, gourmet salads, great cocktails, and an impressive selection of wines. And, of course, no meal at Criniti’s would be complete without one of our authentic Italian classic desserts.

The ambiance of our restaurant is perfect for any occasion, group bookings, or corporate events. Celebrating a birthday in Carlton or Celebrating an event in Carlton, don’t worry. Criniti’s got you covered. Head to our website, crinitis.com.au, or BOOK NOW to secure your party. At Criniti’s, our set menus cover a range of food, dietary requirements, and unlimited refills* while you celebrate your event at Criniti’s Carlton.

Carlton is a suburb located in inner Melbourne, and it is home to one of Criniti’s restaurant locations. The Carlton Criniti’s is situated on Lygon Street, a bustling strip known for its Italian restaurants and cafes. The restaurant has a modern and stylish interior with a welcoming atmosphere.

BOOK NOW

So come and join us at Criniti’s Carlton, where you’ll find the perfect spot to dine, relax, and enjoy the best Italian restaurant in Australia.

page.post_content:
Welcome to Criniti's - the leading restaurant chain serving the best of Italian cuisine with a contemporary Australian twist. Our menu features mouth-watering wood-fired pizzas, pasta, seafood, grilled fish, bruschetta, risotto, ribs, and more. With multiple locations across the country, including Carlton, Southbank, Perth, Castle Hill, Parramatta (next to Bay Vista), Brighton Le Sand, Wetherill Park, and 5 more locations to come this year, we offer a unique dining experience at each of our locations.

At Criniti's, we use only the freshest ingredients and our secret dough recipe to bring you the best wood-fired pizzas in town. Whether you're looking for a quick bite or a leisurely meal, we have something for everyone. Our menu also includes authentic Italian antipasti, steaks, burgers, gourmet salads, cocktails, and an impressive wine selection.

Celebrate any occasion with family and friends at Criniti's - the perfect venue for your event. And don't forget to finish off your meal with one of our authentic Italian classic desserts. Come visit us at any of our locations and experience the taste of Italy right here in Australia.

Keep an eye out for new Criniti's locations coming soon!

This is why at Criniti's we say, when you're here, you're family...salute!
page.content:
Welcome to Criniti’s – the leading restaurant chain serving the best of Italian cuisine with a contemporary Australian twist. Our menu features mouth-watering wood-fired pizzas, pasta, seafood, grilled fish, bruschetta, risotto, ribs, and more. With multiple locations across the country, including Carlton, Southbank, Perth, Castle Hill, Parramatta (next to Bay Vista), Brighton Le Sand, Wetherill Park, and 5 more locations to come this year, we offer a unique dining experience at each of our locations.

At Criniti’s, we use only the freshest ingredients and our secret dough recipe to bring you the best wood-fired pizzas in town. Whether you’re looking for a quick bite or a leisurely meal, we have something for everyone. Our menu also includes authentic Italian antipasti, steaks, burgers, gourmet salads, cocktails, and an impressive wine selection.

Celebrate any occasion with family and friends at Criniti’s – the perfect venue for your event. And don’t forget to finish off your meal with one of our authentic Italian classic desserts. Come visit us at any of our locations and experience the taste of Italy right here in Australia.

Keep an eye out for new Criniti’s locations coming soon!

This is why at Criniti’s we say, when you’re here, you’re family…salute!
